translation.en: Where go you, my friend?
You're crawling in the wrong direction.
That wind you feel is coming from England.
translation.fr:
Ce vent que vous sentez
vient d'Angleterre.

translation.en: Scotland's that way.
My lords.
I'm most sorry for making you wait.
I know you've traveled far and from great travail.
translation.fr:
Je sais que le voyage a été long
et éprouvant.

translation.en: I pray you will know that this time of civil unrest...
translation.fr:
J'espère que vous savez
que ces temps de troubles

translation.en: consumes me...
day and night.
I understand...
battle with the rebel Scots was hard fought.
translation.fr:
que ce fut une rude bataille
contre les rebelles écossais.

translation.en: It was, my liege.
-We lost some 300 men. -[exhales deeply]
-Amen. -[men] Amen.
Good Hotspur...
you led the charge. Were any prisoners of note taken?
translation.fr:
vous avez mené la charge.
Y a-t-il des prisonniers ?

translation.en: Many.
-Are they in train? -No.
And why is that? Why have they not been brought to me directly?
translation.fr:
Pourquoi ne pas les avoir menés
directement à moi ?

translation.en: Why will you not pay cousin Mortimer's ransom?
translation.fr:
Vous refusez de payer
la rançon de Mortimer.

translation.en: You'll need to speak up, my boy.
I'm an old man.
My ears... are filled with hair.
Cousin Mortimer is held by the rebels of Wales.
translation.fr:
Les Gallois retiennent
le cousin Mortimer.

translation.en: Why do you refuse to pay his ransom?
translation.fr:
Pourquoi refuser
de payer sa rançon ?

translation.en: I refuse to pay Mortimer's ransom because I refuse to believe him a prisoner.
translation.fr:
Car je refuse de croire
qu'il a été fait prisonnier.

translation.en: I rather believe Mortimer a traitor.
He has joined the Welsh rebels.
translation.fr: Il a rallié les rebelles gallois.

translation.en: He has betrayed England and is now an enemy of mine, and, therefore, of yours.
translation.fr:
Il a trahi l'Angleterre, il est désormais
mon ennemi et donc le vôtre.

translation.en: You agree with my précis, young Hotspur?
-No. -[Northumberland] My son-- I believe yours to be the ramblings of a crazy old demon.
translation.fr:
Ce sont là les divagations
d'un vieux démon fou.

translation.en: Harry, please, stop this.
[King Henry IV] Oh, no, let him speak.
-I wish to hear him. -[Northumberland] My liege--
translation.fr:
Je souhaite l'entendre. - Majesté...
- Vos divagations

translation.en: Yours are the ramblings of an old man so saturated with malice and mistrust
translation.fr:
- Majesté...
- Vos divagations sourdent tellement la malveillance

translation.en: that he no longer knows up from down,
translation.fr: que vous avez perdu le nord,

translation.en: can no longer see beyond the walls of his own monstrous schloss.
translation.fr:
derrière les remparts
de votre monstrueux château.

translation.en: My family have served you.
translation.fr:
Ma famille vous a servi,
a aidé à votre ascension.

translation.en: We aided you in your ascension, and still we fight for you.
translation.fr:
Ma famille vous a servi,
a aidé à votre ascension. On combat pour vous, comme Mortimer.

translation.en: Cousin Mortimer has fought for you.
translation.fr: On combat pour vous, comme Mortimer.

translation.en: And yet, now, whilst you slobber over that chicken's wing,
translation.fr: Et tandis que vous bavez sur ce poulet,

translation.en: he shivers in a western prison
awaiting mutilation at the hands of Welsh witches.
translation.fr: où les sorcières galloises le mutilent.

translation.en: [Northumberland] My liege...
you must excuse my son.
He needs rest.
We come only... to advocate for your help in securing Mortimer's release.
translation.fr:
On est seulement venus quérir votre aide
pour faire libérer Mortimer.

translation.en: All that we've done for you we have done for the good of England.
translation.fr: On vous a aidé, ainsi que l'Angleterre.

translation.en: But our lands are now more riven with war than ever before.
translation.fr:
La guerre déchire
plus que jamais nos terres.

translation.en: The Scots aren't finished. The Welsh have only just begun. And for what?
translation.fr:
Les Écossais tiennent bon.
Les Gallois commencent. Et pour quoi ?

translation.en: Why do you think this might be, old man?
translation.fr:
Pour quelle raison, croyez-vous,
vieil homme ?

translation.en: Who do you imagine might be to blame for this?
Chickens can't fly.
But I've seen one...
eke enough wing flap to clear a fence.
translation.fr:
franchir une barrière
en battant des ailes.

translation.en: Then it's free.
But then so too are the foxes.
translation.fr: Les renards sont libres, eux aussi.

translation.en: You are right, young Percy. I owe you much.
translation.fr:
Il est vrai, Percy.
J'ai une dette envers vous.

translation.en: I owe your family still more.
But if the Scottish traitors you've taken prisoner
translation.fr: Si les traîtres de prisonniers écossais

translation.en: are not brought to me as speedily as they might travel,
translation.fr: ne sont pas menés devant moi au plus vite,

translation.en: I will hang you by your fucking neck.
translation.fr: je vous pendrai haut et court.

translation.en: Has this been heard, young Percy?
Your Majesty, please forgive us.
What a venomous boy.
He'll betray me now. I'm sure of it.
translation.fr:
Il va me trahir.
J'en suis certain.

translation.en: If only he were my son.
translation.fr:
Si seulement
il était mon fils.

translation.en: [Falstaff] Hal.
[Falstaff] Hal?
-[Falstaff grunts] -What is it? Falstaff has injured hisself.
Yeah. See?
-How did you get inside? -[Falstaff] The door was ajar.
translation.fr:
- Vous êtes entrés ?
- La porte était entrouverte.

translation.en: It was not.
[Falstaff] Yes, it was. It was ajar.
It was not ajar.
Well, how else might we gain entry?
Are you accusing me of having cut myself a secret key?
translation.fr:
M'accusez-vous
de m'être fabriqué une clé secrète ?

translation.en: Yes.
Falstaff has injured hisself, Hal. Will you perform the small repairs?
translation.fr:
Falstaff s'est blessé, Hal.
Pouvez-vous le soigner ?

translation.en: Your Highness.
[grunts] There's a fresh coin in this for you, you know.
translation.fr:
Vous aurez une belle pièce
en récompense.

translation.en: I don't want your coin.
I will require your undiminished loyalty from here till Megiddo.
translation.fr:
Votre loyauté
d'ici jusqu'à Megiddo me suffira.

translation.en: You have that already.
You're a soft negotiator.
[yelps] Hey! You're wasting good wine.
-I'm keeping it clean. -Give it.
Oh. That looks very hot.
[Falstaff] Do it.
Prince Henry.
Who are you?
We come from the royal court. We wish to speak with you privately.
translation.fr:
On arrive de la cour.
On aimerait une entrevue.

translation.en: For what?
Please, sire. Privately.
translation.fr: Je vous en prie, sire. En privé.

translation.en: Oh, privately, in the middle of Eastcheap?
Should I make a quick up and down and request a mass covering of ears?
translation.fr:
Je demande aux gens
de se couvrir les oreilles ?

translation.en: Please, sire.
What is this?
Your father, His Majesty King--
translation.fr: Votre père, Sa Majesté le roi...

translation.en: Your father, His Majesty King Henry, is ill.
translation.fr:
Votre père, Sa Majesté Henri,
est souffrant.

translation.en: He requests your presence.
Hmm. I suggest you return to the palace directly
translation.fr: Je te suggère de rentrer au palais

translation.en: and tell him his request was wholly ignored.
translation.fr:
et de lui dire
que je n'ai cure de sa requête.

translation.en: I've been instructed to deliver the request with great urgency.
translation.fr:
Je dois transmettre sa requête
toutes affaires cessantes.

translation.en: You might tell him the urgency was also wholly ignored.
translation.fr: Dis-lui que je n'ai cure de ses affaires.

translation.en: [whispers] My lady. My lady, it's time to leave.
translation.fr: Madame. Il est l'heure de partir.

translation.en: -Why? -[shushes]
The day has begun. See? -Out there. -[small exhale] It is well underway.
translation.fr:
Le jour s'est levé. Regardez.
Dehors. Le soleil est haut.

translation.en: -[groans] -You might miss it.
Get up now. It's important that you leave.
-Up. That's the spirit. -[groans]
Now, lift your arms.
Very good.
You must get that door fixed.
What is it?
Visit with your father.
Go away.
If your father is indeed gravely ill enough to request your presence,
translation.fr:
Si votre père est assez souffrant
pour vous faire mander,

translation.en: then you must visit with him.
It should be better to regret having done so than it would to have not.
translation.fr:
Mieux vaut le regret d'avoir obéi
que de ne pas s'être déplacé.

translation.en: If your father is ill,
translation.fr:
Si votre père est souffrant,
qu'importe vos sentiments,

translation.en: no matter your feelings for him, you must visit with him.
translation.fr:
Si votre père est souffrant,
qu'importe vos sentiments, vous devez aller le voir.

translation.en: But...
I say this not out of concern for our king's well-being,
translation.fr:
ce n'est pas tant
par préoccupation de la santé de notre roi

translation.en: but more for fear of the drunken soak to which you'll be likely to succumb
translation.fr:
que par crainte de l'ébriété
dans laquelle vous risquez de sombrer

translation.en: should you fail to heed his call and he were to die
translation.fr:
si vous faisiez fi de son appel et qu'il mourait
sans que vous ayez pu régler vos comptes.

translation.en: without you having squared your ledger.
translation.fr:
et qu'il mourait
sans que vous ayez pu régler vos comptes.

translation.en: I fear that would be soak enough to put even me to shame.
translation.fr:
Dans pareil état,
je crains que vous ne m'en remontriez.

translation.en: Do it.
If nothing else I ever suggest.
[archbishop] While I see the strain your treasury is under,
translation.fr: Votre trésor est mis à rude épreuve,

translation.en: I cannot help but wonder if the canker of Lollardy
translation.fr: je me demande si la plaie des Lollards

translation.en: be at the root of this suggestion that the church be burdened with a tax
translation.fr:
est à l'origine de cette suggestion
d'accabler l'église d'un impôt

translation.en: to relieve problems that are not of the church's making.
translation.fr:
pour résoudre des problèmes
auxquels l'église est étrangère.

translation.en: Your Majesty.
Henry, Prince of Wales.
[King Henry IV] My son.
Come in.
I feel my life nearing its natural end, and yet, still...
translation.fr:
Je sens que ma vie touche à sa fin,
et pourtant,

translation.en: even I must appear of ruder health than you.
translation.fr:
ma composition paraît
plus robuste que la tienne.

translation.en: The time has come for us to consider...
translation.fr: Le moment est venu pour nous de considérer

translation.en: the issue of...
my succession.
You will not be king.
While you are my eldest son,
for reasons that are on display for all here to see,
translation.fr: pour des raisons évidentes au vu de tous,

translation.en: smell...
you will not inherit this crown.
translation.fr: tu n'hériteras point de la couronne.

translation.en: Nor have I sought it.
That privilege and responsibility  will instead fall to your brother Thomas.
translation.fr:
Ce privilège et cette responsabilité
échoiront à ton frère Thomas.

translation.en: He is soft, but he is eager.
He will lead my army against the newly treasonous Harry Percy.
translation.fr:
Il mènera mon armée
contre le nouveau félon Harry Percy.

translation.en: I will assume that this news comes as neither surprise nor disappointment.
translation.fr:
Je pars du principe que cette nouvelle
n'est ni une surprise ni une déception.

translation.en: But it is my duty as king,
translation.fr: Mais il est de mon devoir en tant que roi

translation.en: and father...
to say it to you directly.
When do you fight?
I set off tomorrow.
We fight by week's end.
You need not fight.
These feuds need not be yours.
translation.fr: Ne fais pas tiennes ces querelles.

translation.en: [King Henry IV] I have said...
what you were summonsed to hear.
translation.fr: ce que je voulais te dire.

translation.en: Leave us now.
-Your Highness. -Stop.
-Your Highness. -Stop.
Lord Dorset.
Are your men ready for the day?
They are, sire.
Very good.
Tell me of your preparations.
My lord.
Why are you here?
I will not allow this havoc to transpire.
I've come to see it stopped.
This is my battle.
If I have my way, there will be no battle.
translation.fr:
Il n'y en aura pas
si j'ai mon mot à dire.

translation.en: You. Come here.
-[man] My lord. -You have no place here.
translation.fr: Monseigneur. Ta place n'est pas ici.

translation.en: Go to the rebel camp, deliver the following message to Percy Hotspur.
translation.fr:
Va au camp rebelle,
remettre ce message à Percy Hotspur.

translation.en: Tell him that Prince Henry challenges him to settle today's score man on man. He and I.
translation.fr:
Dis-lui que le prince Henri le met au défi
de régler ça d'homme à homme.

translation.en: We will fight in our armies' places.
translation.fr:
On combattra
à la place de nos armées.

translation.en: Yes, my lord.
Who do you think you are?
I am nobody to you.
I will fight him.
And I will defeat him.
That you surely would, my son.
But it cannot be.
The prince speaks not for his father.
translation.fr: Le prince ne parle pas pour son père.

translation.en: You are eager to fight, my son.
translation.fr: Tu es impatient de combattre, mon fils.

translation.en: And you will.
And we shall fight alongside you.
We will burn them.
We will burn Henry's reign to the ground.
translation.fr:
Nous réduirons
le règne d'Henri en cendres.

translation.en: -[Thomas] You have no place here. -You do not know war, Thomas.
translation.fr:
- Tu n'as rien à faire ici.
- Tu ne connais pas la guerre.

translation.en: -I do know war. -[Hal] You do not.
You've been recruited to our father's madness,
translation.fr:
Tu as été embrigadé
dans la folie de notre père,

translation.en: to wars that need not be fought.
translation.fr: dans des guerres qui peuvent être évitées.

translation.en: These men are not our enemies.
translation.fr:
Ces hommes ne sont pas nos ennemis.
Ils le sont par la faute de notre père.

translation.en: -Our father has made them thus. -[Thomas] Why then are you here?
translation.fr:
Ces hommes ne sont pas nos ennemis.
Ils le sont par la faute de notre père. Pourquoi es-tu ici ?

translation.en: You so disapprove of our cause,
and yet, still, you find it necessary to upstage me.
translation.fr:
mais tu ne peux t'empêcher
de m'éclipser.

translation.en: I do this not to steal your thunder, brother.
translation.fr:
Je ne cherche pas
à m'attribuer tes mérites.

translation.en: I do it to save your life.
translation.fr: Mais à te sauver la vie.

translation.en: [man] Pardon me, my lords.
Our herald is returned from the rebel camp.
translation.fr: Notre héraut est rentré du camp rebelle.

translation.en: They have refused Prince Henry's offer.
translation.fr: Ils refusent l'offre du prince Henri.

translation.en: They want battle.
Where is Henry?
I come to fight him in our armies' stead.
translation.fr:
Je veux l'affronter
à la place de nos armées.

translation.en: His offer was refused.
The offer has been reconsidered.
I said... [shouts] no!
Why is the little dog barking?
[yells] Where be the big dog?
It will be done.
And here I am with the whoring fool.
translation.fr: Me voilà face au fou débauché.

translation.en: This fight need not be had, Percy.
My father will soon be dead. Your grievances will die with him.
translation.fr:
Mon père va mourir.
Vos griefs mourront avec lui.

translation.en: Don't be afraid of our small contest, young Hal.
translation.fr: Ne crains pas notre petit affrontement.

translation.en: I promise to finish it quickly.
Your father...
is plague to England.
Come for me, big dog!
Someday this will be your head, dropped at the feet of a man
translation.fr:
Un jour, ce sera ta tête, jetée aux pieds d'un homme
qui aurait pu être ton frère.

translation.en: who might otherwise have been your brother.
translation.fr:
jetée aux pieds d'un homme
qui aurait pu être ton frère.

translation.en: Come with me now, Thomas, please.
Walk away from this field.
After you have stolen its prized scalp?
translation.fr: Après que tu as volé son heaume ?

translation.en: This is what will be spoken of tomorrow.
translation.fr: Voici ce dont on parlera demain.

translation.en: [sighs] This field was mine.
It was to mark my dominion.
translation.fr: Le haut fait de ma souveraineté.

translation.en: Instead now...
it marks only this head.
This fucking head!
Move.
-[Hooper] John. -[groans]
Go away.
You might want to see to your otherwise well-appointed friend.
translation.fr:
Vous devriez aller voir
votre ami autrement bien nommé.

translation.en: He seems to have taken a pitiful turn.
translation.fr: Il semble pris dans des affres.

translation.en: [whispers] Beale.
Hal's up-chucked again.
Hello, friend.
Many times have I seen men in your state.
translation.fr:
J'ai souvent vu
des hommes dans votre état.

translation.en: I've been in it many times over myself.
translation.fr: J'ai moi-même souvent connu cet état.

translation.en: For all our rejoice of... courage and valor,
translation.fr:
On a beau se rengorger
de courage et de bravoure,

translation.en: nothing stains the soul more indelibly than killing.
translation.fr:
rien n'entache l'âme plus durablement
que de tuer.

translation.en: Never have I felt so vile... than standing victorious on a battlefield.
translation.fr:
Jamais je n'ai ressenti un si grand dégoût
que victorieux, sur un champ de bataille.

translation.en: The thrill of victory fades quickly.
translation.fr:
Le frisson de la victoire
s'estompe promptement.

translation.en: What lingers long after... is always ugly.
translation.fr: Toujours remplacé à terme par l'horreur.

translation.en: Never again, I say.
[Hal] Stop talking, old man, please.
translation.fr: Tais-toi, vieil homme, je t'en conjure.

translation.en: Please stop talking.
I will never stop talking, Hal.
Never.
Never ever.
[William] Out.
[William] My lord.
What business?
[William] It is a matter of great urgency.
translation.fr:
Une affaire
de la plus grande urgence.

translation.en: Mm. You should hurry along then.
translation.fr: Tu ferais mieux de te dépêcher.

translation.en: Please, my lord.
It is your father.
He's dying.
Hmm, that hook has lost its worm.
translation.fr: Je ne mordrai plus à l'hameçon.

translation.en: [William] Wait outside.
No doubt...
your father has brought...
much trouble to this kingdom,
translation.fr: de bien des conflits en ce royaume...

translation.en: and I fear the chaos that might erupt in his absence.
translation.fr:
et je crains
qu'en son absence s'ensuive le chaos.

translation.en: England needs a king, and I suspect those sentiments of yours
translation.fr:
L'Angleterre a besoin d'un roi,
et m'est avis que vos sentiments

translation.en: that had you resile from him
translation.fr: qui vous ont fait le désavouer

translation.en: are precisely those the governance of this land needs.
translation.fr:
sont précisément ceux dont la gouvernance
de ce royaume a besoin.

translation.en: You must be king.
Why do you say this to me?
Speak to Thomas.
Is he not to be your new king?
translation.fr: Ne doit-il pas devenir ton roi ?

translation.en: I'm afraid that is not possible.
translation.fr: Je crains que ce soit impossible.

translation.en: Your brother was killed in Wales.
translation.fr: Votre frère a été tué au Pays de Galles.

translation.en: After you defeated Percy Hotspur,
translation.fr: Après que vous avez défait Percy Hotspur,

translation.en: young Thomas pressed on to the western fields.
translation.fr:
le jeune Thomas s'est précipité
sur les champs occidentaux.

translation.en: This is where he met his end.
It is said he gave valiant account of himself.
translation.fr:
On raconte qu'il a fait preuve
d'une grande bravoure.

translation.en: [Hal yells] Where is he?!
Where is the monster?!
Where is the monster?
Move. Leave him. The King needs rest.
translation.fr:
- Laissez-le.
- Le roi doit se reposer.

translation.en: -Soon he will have it. -He's dying.
Leave.
You feel this cold?
-Wretch. -[whimpers]
[weakly] Hal.
You must be king, Hal.
Please.
You must be king, Hal.
I know not what I have done.
You know not what will become of you.
translation.fr:
Vous ignorez
ce qui vous arrivera.

translation.en: So, I offer you this...
The most blessed reprieve,
the most dreadful misery.
You shall suffer the indignity of serving me,
translation.fr: Vous souffrirez l'indignité de me servir,

translation.en: the wayward son you so revile.
translation.fr: le fils rétif que vous honnissez tant.

translation.en: But know now you will be watched over by an altogether different king.
translation.fr:
Sachez que vous serez suppléés
par un roi autrement différent.

translation.en: What is this?
Who are you?
I am I.
Who are you?
[Lord Chamberlain] What is your purpose here?
I think you just woke me up from it, didn't you?
Rise from that bed at once.
Who are you?
Where is Hal?
These lodgings and their contents are the property of the King of England.
translation.fr:
Ce logement et son contenu
appartiennent au roi d'Angleterre.

translation.en: You are trespassing and I order you to vacate at once.
translation.fr:
Vous violez cette propriété,
quittez les lieux sur-le-champ.

translation.en: What King of England?
[archbishop] All hail King Henry.
[crowd] King Henry! King Henry! King Henry!
King Wenceslaus of Bohemia
presents this gift to King Henry of England.
translation.fr:
offre ce présent
au roi Henri d'Angleterre.

translation.en: To long and good health.
Beautiful.
I'm sure you all know...
my young sister Philippa has joined us here today.
translation.fr:
que ma jeune sœur Philippa
est avec nous.

translation.en: Queen of Denmark.
I'm thankful she and her husband,
translation.fr: Je la remercie, ainsi que son mari,

translation.en: the good King Eric, have traveled all this way.
translation.fr:
le bon roi Éric,
d'avoir voyagé jusqu'ici.

translation.en: I wish for you take this vase, my dear.
translation.fr: Je souhaite t'offrir ce vase, ma chère.

translation.en: Let its beauty stand for your beauty, which stands in turn for England's beauty.
translation.fr:
Sa beauté reflète ta propre beauté,
qui reflète celle de l'Angleterre.

translation.en: I thank you, my lord.
[Lord Chamberlain] His Serenity, the doge of the Republic of Venice,
translation.fr:
Sa Sérénité,
le doge de la république de Venise,

translation.en: present this gift in your honor, my liege.
translation.fr: offre ce présent en votre honneur.

translation.en: -It says it is a bird from Constantinople. -[King Henry V] A bird?
translation.fr: Ce serait un oiseau de Constantinople. Un oiseau ? Mort, j'imagine.

translation.en: A dead one, I should suppose.
If I may, my liege.
Unnatural mechanics from the edge of Christendom.
translation.fr:
Des mécanismes artificiels
des confins de la chrétienté.

translation.en: [King Henry V] A wonder.
This belongs to my cousin, Cambridge.
Of all at this table, none have I known longer than I have you.
translation.fr:
Parmi tous ceux présents,
je te connais depuis le plus longtemps.

translation.en: Indeed I have known you longer than I have my own young sister.
translation.fr:
Plus longtemps même
que je connais ma propre sœur.

translation.en: We were raised together. You're like an older brother to me.
translation.fr:
On a été élevés ensemble.
Tu es comme mon frère aîné.

translation.en: So, I think it only fitting that you should have this magical bird.
translation.fr:
Il est donc normal
que cet oiseau magique te revienne.

translation.en: Let's hope its magic isn't black and unholy.
translation.fr:
Pourvu que ce ne soit pas
de la magie noire impie.

translation.en: [Lord Chamberlain] From the Dauphin, son of His Majesty, Charles, King of France.
translation.fr:
De la part du dauphin, fils de Sa Majesté,
Charles, roi de France.

translation.en: A ball.
There is no accompanying message from the Dauphin?
No, my liege.
I shall keep this gift.
This one is sent only for me.
For the boy I once was.
The ball is an insult to you and to your kingdom.
translation.fr:
Cette balle est une insulte
envers vous et votre royaume.

translation.en: You must respond.
Remember where, as prince, I whiled and how I spent my days?
translation.fr:
Vous rappelez-vous
à quoi je consacrais mon temps avant ?

translation.en: [William] You spent them in considered privation.
translation.fr:
Vous le passiez
dans une privation réfléchie.

translation.en: Drinking, clowning.
So, is there not some truth in this jest?
translation.fr:
Cette plaisanterie ne recèle-t-elle
nulle vérité ?

translation.en: If the Dauphin wants from me a paroxysm, why give it him?
translation.fr:
Si le dauphin cherche à me provoquer,
pourquoi céder ?

translation.en: It would not be a show of foul temper
translation.fr:
On ne saurait vous taxer
de mauvais caractère

translation.en: for you to respond forcefully to an insult such as that.
translation.fr:
si vous répondiez rudement
à pareille insulte.

translation.en: It would be a show of strength. I appreciate your umbrage, William,
translation.fr:
- Vous feriez montre de force.
- J'apprécie ton ombrage,

translation.en: but my strength does not lie in me flapping up and down at the slightest barb like...
translation.fr:
mais ce n'est pas être fort
que de m'affoler au moindre camouflet

translation.en: -some unholy mechanical bird. -Mm.
Make sense of this. This is what is pressing.
translation.fr:
Il faut régler cela.
C'est bien plus urgent.

translation.en: Civil strife has consumed us.
translation.fr: Les luttes intestines nous ont rongés.

translation.en: The war drains the purse like little else.
translation.fr: La guerre vide le trésor en grande partie.

translation.en: This strife must end.
And it will end... by conciliation.
translation.fr: Et cela se fera par la conciliation.

translation.en: We shall pardon our adversaries.
And we shall pay Mortimer's ransom and have him returned from Wales.
translation.fr:
Et on paiera la rançon pour que Mortimer
rentre du Pays de Galles.

translation.en: I will write these pardons in mine own hand.
translation.fr:
Je rédigerai ces pardons
de ma propre main.

translation.en: I want it known these sentiments are so personal to me.
translation.fr:
Que l'on sache
que ces sentiments sont les miens.

translation.en: We shall let these men know they were my father's enemies, not mine.
translation.fr:
Que ces hommes sachent qu'ils étaient
ennemis de mon père, pas de moi.

translation.en: [William] Certainly, my liege.
How does this strategy greet you?
Great reforms are best enacted with regime change.
translation.fr:
Un changement de régime
facilite les grandes réformes.

translation.en: If this is how you wish to proceed,
then, yes, my liege,
now is the time to do it.
Did you reconcile with our father before his death?
translation.fr:
T'es-tu réconcilié avec notre père
avant sa mort ?

translation.en: There was no reconciliation to be had.
He did untold harm to this kingdom.
translation.fr: Il a rendu ce royaume exsangue.

translation.en: His death will bring calm with it.
I ask not after the kingdom.
translation.fr: Je ne parle pas du royaume.

translation.en: What of you?
I want an end to this unrest.
translation.fr:
Je veux mettre un terme
à ces troubles.

translation.en: Look around that table last night.
translation.fr: Repense à la table d'hier soir.

translation.en: Look at the faces of the men seated at it.
I can feel this calm of which you speak.
translation.fr: Je ressens ce calme dont tu parles.

translation.en: I do believe they wish you well.
translation.fr: Ils sont favorables à ta cause.

translation.en: But I also see that they have their own kingdoms behind their eyes.
translation.fr:
Ils n'en oublient pas pour autant
leurs propres royaumes.

translation.en: Do you understand what I say?
I've been away too many years and I'm now to return to Denmark.
translation.fr:
Je suis partie
depuis maintes années au Danemark.

translation.en: But I have, in my time in that court, been privy to its commissions.
translation.fr:
Mais, quand j'étais à la cour,
j'ai connu ses coulisses.

translation.en: I have seen there, again and again, that no one ever speaks true, wholly true.
translation.fr:
J'ai vu qu'inlassablement, personne
n'exprime jamais le fond de sa pensée.

translation.en: Choose your steps wisely, dear brother.
translation.fr: Fais des choix avisés, cher frère.

translation.en: [archbishop] I speak to Charles of France's claim
translation.fr: La revendication du roi de France

translation.en: to be the legitimate sovereign ruler of said lands.
translation.fr:
d'être le souverain légitime
desdites terres.

translation.en: It is said that the Salic law would have no succession
translation.fr: La loi salique proscrit toute succession

translation.en: if the French crown fall to a woman.
translation.fr: si la couronne échoit à une femme.

translation.en: Meaning, no rule left in the lineage of the female
translation.fr:
Un pouvoir légué à une femme,
par droit, ne saurait être transmis

translation.en: shall, by rights, pass to her issue.
translation.fr:
Un pouvoir légué à une femme,
par droit, ne saurait être transmis à sa descendance.

translation.en: Now, the law Salic, which is of Frankish land
translation.fr: La loi salique, propre aux terres franques

translation.en: and tethered to said lands is not--
not therefore legally bound or adherent at all, in fact,
translation.fr:
n'est pas légalement liée ni affiliée,
de fait, aux terres de France,

translation.en: to the lands of France, but to those of Francia,
translation.fr:
n'est pas légalement liée ni affiliée,
de fait, aux terres de France, mais à celles des royaumes francs,

translation.en: which, as you know, lies between the rivers of Elbe and Saale.
translation.fr: délimités par l'Elbe et la Saale.

translation.en: I claim here, with proof, that hence it follows that the law Salic,
translation.fr:
J'avance donc, preuve à l'appui,
que, selon la loi salique,

translation.en: which has seen French sovereignty stolen as such from a true lineage--
translation.fr:
la souveraineté française
a été usurpée, à trois reprises,

translation.en: Thrice, as I can illuminate, the French have cited the law Salic
translation.fr:
la souveraineté française
a été usurpée, à trois reprises, comme je le mets en lumière,
les Français ont cité la loi

translation.en: -as reason to bar a female succession-- -With reverence.
translation.fr:
- pour empêcher une femme...
- Avec respect.

translation.en: Yes, my liege?
I'm finding this story impossible to follow.
My liege, I question the so-called French king's claim
translation.fr:
Je remets en question la prétendue
revendication du roi de France

translation.en: to the throne upon which he sits.
translation.fr: au trône sur lequel il siège.

translation.en: Is that so?
What confuses me now is why you are telling me this story.
translation.fr:
Je ne saisis pas
pourquoi vous me narrez ce récit.

translation.en: My liege, I simply aim to bolster your claim to France
translation.fr:
Je cherche à appuyer
votre revendication à la France

translation.en: should the need to meet her with force soon arise.
And you believe that need will indeed soon arise?
translation.fr:
Et vous estimez
que ce sera bientôt le cas ?

translation.en: I-- [chuckles]
My liege...
by way of preparedness,
translation.fr:
dans un souci de préparation,
j'estime sage...

translation.en: -I believe it always wise-- -Preparedness?
translation.fr:
dans un souci de préparation,
j'estime sage... De préparation ?
Pour guerroyer contre la France,

translation.en: If we are to war with France, it will not come as a consequence
translation.fr:
De préparation ?
Pour guerroyer contre la France, nul besoin d'un vieux madrigal obscur.

translation.en: of an old and impenetrable madrigal.
translation.fr: nul besoin d'un vieux madrigal obscur.

translation.en: France was your father's long-held ambition.
translation.fr:
La France était
l'aspiration de votre père.

translation.en: Had he not been bogged in civil feud,
translation.fr:
S'il n'avait pas été embourbé
dans les querelles,

translation.en: he would most surely have taken the fight to her.
translation.fr: il aurait assurément attaqué la France.

translation.en: And then... on to Jerusalem.
Jerusalem?
We're all the way to the Holy Land, are we?
And presumably to sack the rest of Christendom along the way.
translation.fr:
Vraisemblablement pour piller
le reste de la chrétienté au passage.

translation.en: I am not my father, archbishop.
translation.fr: Je ne suis pas mon père, Monseigneur.

translation.en: I would have thought this to be clear by now.
translation.fr: Je pensais que c'était bien clair.

translation.en: [William] We must forgive our archbishop.
translation.fr: Nous devons pardonner à notre archevêque.

translation.en: He is a far...
[exhales] far from gifted orator.
Which is strange, given I would have thought gifted oratory
translation.fr:
Chose étrange, je pensais
que c'était un prérequis pour ce poste.

translation.en: to be a requirement of the position.
translation.fr:
je pensais
que c'était un prérequis pour ce poste.

translation.en: Why is the archbishop speaking to me of war with France?
translation.fr:
Pourquoi me parle-t-il
de guerre contre la France ?

translation.en: What we are witnessing is a stirring,
of which we must be wary.
I applaud... your restraint.
After so many years of strife,
you are proving to be more than your father's son.
translation.fr:
vous vous révélez être
bien plus que digne d'être roi.

translation.en: You wish to be a king for the people.
translation.fr: Vous voulez être roi pour le peuple.

translation.en: Now, we must ensure to that end, however,
translation.fr: Pour ce faire, on doit s'assurer

translation.en: you do not remain oblivious to the mood of the people.
translation.fr:
que vous soyez bien conscient
de l'état d'esprit du peuple.

translation.en: And what mood is this?
That France is taunting us.
translation.fr: Le fait que la France nous brocarde.

translation.en: Do you share this mood?
this mood is a fantasy.
But that does not mean it is not felt true.
translation.fr: Mais c'est le ressenti du peuple.

translation.en: -[Beale] Where are you going? -[Falstaff groans] Disgusting.
-No, we can't be going to Hooper's. -Yes, we can.
translation.fr: On ne peut aller chez Hooper. Mais si.

translation.en: -No, she won't have you. -Yes, she will.
translation.fr:
- Elle ne veut pas te voir.
- Ça ira.

translation.en: -You're not welcome here. -[grunts]
translation.fr: Tu n'es pas le bienvenu ici.

translation.en: Unless you've come to pay me what you owe me.
translation.fr: Sauf si c'est pour payer ta dette.

translation.en: [Falstaff] I have paid you.
You've paid me a snatch of what you owe.
translation.fr: Une bribe de ce que tu me dois.

translation.en: And I presume, too, from the proceeds of thieving.
translation.fr:
Et j'imagine
que c'est le fruit d'un larcin.

translation.en: [Falstaff] Lies.
By all account, you be not specially good at thieving neither.
translation.fr:
Et à ce qu'on dit,
tu n'es pas très doué.

translation.en: Lies.
How dare you address me so?
Why would you be so churlish
translation.fr:
Pourquoi tant de discourtoisie
envers l'homme

translation.en: with the very man most likely to lift you from your stinking rat hole?
translation.fr:
Pourquoi tant de discourtoisie
envers l'homme le plus susceptible
de te tirer hors de ce trou à rat ?

translation.en: Oh, maybe you've forgot.
My associations now stretch to the highest reaches of the realm.
translation.fr:
Mes associations s'étendent
aux plus hautes sphères du royaume.

translation.en: Your insolence might as well be directed to the king himself.
translation.fr:
Autant tourner ton insolence
envers le roi.

translation.en: Ponder that now.
[Hooper] Are you speaking of Hal?
Where is he?
-[Falstaff exhales] -Where is Hal?
Where's our king?
He be gone weeks and weeks now. Where is he?
translation.fr:
Des semaines qu'il a disparu.
Où est-il ?

translation.en: -[clears throat] -I would say... -[sighs] -you be the one that's been forgot.
translation.fr: C'est plutôt toi qui as été oublié.

translation.en: -Oh. -I would say that your dalliance with the upper reaches of the realm
translation.fr:
Je dirais que ton badinage fugace
avec les hautes sphères du royaume

translation.en: was short-lived in and around his stinking sick bucket.
translation.fr: s'est limité à son pot de chambre.

translation.en: Seems you were little more than passing keeper of a prince's puke.
translation.fr:
Tu n'as guère été plus
qu'un vulgaire gardien de vomi de prince.

translation.en: -[laughter] -Shut up.
translation.fr:
Tu n'as guère été plus
qu'un vulgaire gardien de vomi de prince. Ton caquet.

translation.en: Ponder that now.
Nell, Sir John is down on his luck.
I am not.
You find someone to pay your way here.
translation.fr: Trouve quelqu'un pour payer ta dette.

translation.en: I'll not be paying it for you.
[man] Head.
He seeks asylum in return for his tale.
translation.fr:
Il demande l'asile
en échange de son récit.

translation.en: I do not doubt this can be arranged.
translation.fr: Nul doute que ça peut s'arranger.

translation.en: [in English] At such a time as I endeavor to foster a fresh and peaceful air
translation.fr:
Alors que je m'efforce d'encourager un vent nouveau
à souffler dans ce royaume,

translation.en: for this kingdom to breathe,
translation.fr:
d'encourager un vent nouveau
à souffler dans ce royaume,

translation.en: it is not in my interest to stir hostility with another.
translation.fr:
je n'ai aucun intérêt
à provoquer les hostilités.

translation.en: This is an act of war.
[William] We share your longing for peace, my liege,
translation.fr:
Nous partageons
votre désir de paix, Majesté,

translation.en: but to ignore such an audacious act of aggression
translation.fr:
mais ignorer
un acte d'agression aussi audacieux

translation.en: will be seen as weakness.
This is no game ball. This is an assassin.
translation.fr:
Ce n'est pas un jeu.
Il s'agit d'un assassin.

translation.en: Would you consider me weak, Chief Justice?
translation.fr: Me considérez-vous faible, juge en chef ?

translation.en: No, I speak more of the kingdom.
What the kingdom sees. What the kingdom sees. Mm.
translation.fr:
- Ce que voit le royaume.
- Ce que voit le royaume.

translation.en: How, pray, might the kingdom see the weasel beneath our feet?
translation.fr:
Dis-moi comment le royaume
pourrait voir cela comme une lâcheté ?

translation.en: If France's animus towards you
translation.fr: Si l'animosité de la France à votre égard

translation.en: runs deep enough for them to send an assassin,
translation.fr: est ancrée au point d'envoyer un assassin,

translation.en: it will be felt in the street, ours and theirs.
translation.fr: la rue le ressentira, ici comme là-bas.

translation.en: It will be known.
We share your concerns. But peace today needs more than harmony.
translation.fr:
Nous partageons vos inquiétudes.
Mais l'harmonie ne suffit pas à la paix.

translation.en: It needs strength... and confidence.
translation.fr:
Elle requiert de la force
et de la confiance.

translation.en: These are qualities that can originate only in you,
translation.fr:
Qualités qui ne peuvent émaner
que de vous,

translation.en: the king.
Our king.
Take down these words...
addressed to King Charles of France.
translation.fr: adressés au roi Charles de France.

translation.en: This assassin you send
can be taken as nothing other than an infant act of war.
translation.fr: est le prémisse d'un acte de guerre.

translation.en: If this be your intention,
I say you let it be known plainly
and that you desist from this timorous slither
translation.fr:
exposez-le clairement et cessez ces sournoiseries timorées
dans lesquelles vous êtes engagé.

translation.en: in which you presently engage.
translation.fr:
ces sournoiseries timorées
dans lesquelles vous êtes engagé.

translation.en: If it be war you seek,
send the full weight of your army.
translation.fr:
envoyez tout le poids
de votre armée.

translation.en: For a lone, cowardly assassin
translation.fr: Car un assassin lâche et solitaire

translation.en: will not topple this King Henry the Fifth of England you so underestimate.
translation.fr:
ne renversera pas ce roi Henri V
d'Angleterre que vous sous-estimez tant.

translation.en: Fill this with gunstones and send it back to France.
translation.fr:
Emplissez ça de boulets
et envoyez-le en France.

translation.en: -[Cambridge] Who is it? -A Frenchman, sire.
He says he wishes to speak with you privately.
translation.fr: Il souhaite vous parler en privé.

translation.en: About what?
[man] He wouldn't say, sire.
I asked of him, he wouldn't say.
My king has sent me to seek out men he feels he can trust.
translation.fr:
Mon roi m'a envoyé
trouver des hommes dignes de confiance.

translation.en: He believes there is discreet discussion to be had.
translation.fr:
Il pense
qu'un conciliabule peut être mené.

translation.en: What discussion?
He believes there is discussion to be had about your new king of England.
translation.fr:
Il pense qu'il faut discuter
de votre nouveau roi d'Angleterre.

translation.en: [Cambridge] Only myself and Lord Grey were met.
translation.fr:
Il n'a rencontré
que Lord Grey et moi-même.

translation.en: We knew not where to turn about what was spoken to us.
translation.fr:
On ignorait vers qui se tourner
concernant cet échange.

translation.en: [Grey] We're all of us aware there's a standing problem.
translation.fr:
On est tous conscients
qu'il y a un problème.

translation.en: Our king is of low repute.
translation.fr: La réputation de notre roi est mauvaise.

translation.en: The French king... teaches you this?
translation.fr:
C'est ce que vous apprend
le roi de France ?

translation.en: Is he not thankful
for our young Henry's light reaction to his provocation?
translation.fr:
de la réaction modérée de notre jeune
Henri face à sa provocation ?

translation.en: The assassin he swears he knows not of.
translation.fr: Il jure ne rien savoir de cet assassin.

translation.en: 'Tis a charge he denies.
His plot came to naught.
Of course he would wish to wipe his hands of it.
translation.fr: Normal qu'il s'en lave les mains.

translation.en: [Cambridge] Whatever the root,
they have expressed grave concern
regarding our king's mental fortitude.
translation.fr: quant à la force d'âme de notre roi.

translation.en: This envoy is to be trusted, is he not, Cambridge?
translation.fr:
On peut se fier à cet émissaire,
n'est-il pas, Cambridge ?

translation.en: I believe so.
Charles wishes to dethrone our king.
The issue is not France.
translation.fr: Le problème n'est pas la France.

translation.en: This is but a reminder to us of a more general lunacy.
translation.fr:
Ce n'est qu'un rappel
d'une démence plus générale.

translation.en: A boy who but weeks ago was a drunken boor
translation.fr: Un garçon qui n'était qu'un cuistre aviné

translation.en: from the sewers of Eastcheap now wears England's crown.
translation.fr:
dans le cloaque d'Eastcheap
est désormais le roi.

translation.en: -Hmm. -[Grey] What shall become of us?
What shall become of us when civil misdeeds are forgiven
as if they were but indiscretions?
-When traitors-- -Yes, yes, Lord Grey, your--
translation.fr:
- Que des traîtres...
- Oui, Lord Grey,

translation.en: Your concerns are current.
And they are numerous.
translation.fr: Et il y en a bien d'autres.

translation.en: Something must be done.
Something will be done.
Give me quiet.
[William] Thus is a king's burden.
translation.fr: Tel est le fardeau d'un roi.

translation.en: A king must make decisions
lesser men are...
neither willing nor able to make.
A king is indeed presented with quandaries
translation.fr: Un roi est mis face à des dilemmes

translation.en: lesser men might never encounter in the course of their whole lives.
translation.fr:
que des hommes moindres ne rencontrent
jamais au cours de leur vie.

translation.en: I wish it were not so.
But problems...
And this is my experience.
Problems that are left unattended...
have a habit of becoming crises.
translation.fr: ont coutume de se transformer en crises.

translation.en: You have a chance here to unite the land, Hal.
translation.fr: Vous avez l'occasion d'unir le pays, Hal.

translation.en: Truly.
You have refreshed its mood with promise.
translation.fr: Vos promesses ont revigoré les mentalités.

translation.en: But promise must be fulfilled.
translation.fr:
Or une promesse
se doit d'être tenue.

translation.en: Promise can never be an end in itself.
translation.fr:
Une promesse ne saurait être
une fin en soi.

translation.en: As of this day, we're at war with France.
translation.fr: Nous sommes en guerre contre la France.

translation.en: Twice I have given her the benefit of my doubt.
translation.fr:
Deux fois,
je lui ai accordé le bénéfice du doute.

translation.en: This third affront will not be left unchecked.
translation.fr:
Ce troisième affront
ne restera pas impuni.

translation.en: And so, in order to flush these French rats from their nests,
translation.fr:
Et, par conséquent,
pour faire sortir ces rats de Français,

translation.en: I will have it communicated to them that we are now at war.
translation.fr:
je leur ferai savoir
que nous sommes désormais en guerre.

translation.en: My Lord Grey.
Cambridge.
I would ask you to deliver this message to France, given your...
translation.fr:
Je vous confierais de transmettre
ce message à la France, au vu

translation.en: familiarity with its recipient.
translation.fr:
de votre familiarité
avec le destinataire.

translation.en: But I believe in the morning you be otherwise engaged.
translation.fr:
Mais demain matin,
vous aurez d'autres engagements.

translation.en: Pray how, my liege?
Tomorrow you will have your heads cut off.
I have chosen to send you as an advance party to Hell
translation.fr:
Je vais vous envoyer
en tant qu'éclaireurs en enfer

translation.en: for the considerable French number
that will soon be needing to find space there.
translation.fr: qui devront bientôt y trouver place.

translation.en: You were once my friend.
I am your friend...
cousin.
All leave.
Now.
You.
Stay.
You...
leave.
This is my place.
[King Henry V] The hostess can stay.
I will not jump to your attention.
translation.fr: Je ne me mettrai pas au garde-à-vous.

translation.en: [inhales] And surely not to retread vile ground
translation.fr:
Et surtout pas
pour sombrer dans la fange,

translation.en: I vowed never to walk again.
translation.fr:
j'ai juré
qu'on ne m'y prendrait plus.

translation.en: I acknowledge my neglect of you, John.
A new chapter of my life has begun before the last could be properly closed.
translation.fr:
Un chapitre de ma vie s'est ouvert
avant que le précédent ne soit fermé.

translation.en: These concerns are mine and mine alone.
translation.fr: Ces préoccupations ne regardent que moi.

translation.en: But the fact that this here be the first occasion
translation.fr: Mais le fait que je ne les énonce

translation.en: I've had to sound them aloud to anyone other than myself speaks volumes.
translation.fr: de vive voix que maintenant en dit long.

translation.en: It speaks to the loneliness of the position in which I find myself.
translation.fr:
Cela révèle la solitude
du poste que j'occupe.

translation.en: To steer our present course,
translation.fr:
Dans la situation actuelle,
j'ai dû me reposer

translation.en: I've been forced to rely upon the counsel of men
translation.fr:
Dans la situation actuelle,
j'ai dû me reposer sur des hommes dont je remets en cause
la loyauté en permanence.

translation.en: whose loyalty I question every waking moment.
translation.fr:
sur des hommes dont je remets en cause
la loyauté en permanence.

translation.en: Every waking moment.
I need men around me I can trust.
I'm here because you are my friend.
translation.fr: Je suis ici, car tu es mon ami.

translation.en: A king has no friends.
A king has only...
followers...
and foe.
I'm sorry my occasion to visit...
translation.fr: Je suis navré de venir te voir

translation.en: carries with it this doleful weight.
Hal.
I will come with you.
I ask only one favor in return.
translation.fr: Je ne demande qu'une faveur en retour.

translation.en: [exhales] Square my account with that terrible hag...
translation.fr: Réglez mes comptes avec cette harpie.

translation.en: over there. Would you?
[King Henry V] We welcome those newly arrived here.
Turn us now in common poise, with one mind, sharpened.
translation.fr:
Puisse notre force être commune,
un seul esprit, affûté.

translation.en: Together...
we will bring France down.
Together...
we will bring her to her knees.
Captains all, to this end,
I wish to introduce to you a new marshal of our campaign.
translation.fr:
je vous présente
un nouveau maréchal pour notre campagne.

translation.en: Sir John Falstaff.
Sir John's experience in battle should need no recitation. You know of him.
translation.fr:
Nul besoin de conter son expérience
au combat. Vous le connaissez.

translation.en: Some of you have had the honor of fighting alongside him.
translation.fr:
Certains ont eu l'honneur
de combattre à ses côtés.

translation.en: Others have heard tale of his exploits.
translation.fr:
D'autres ont entendu
le récit de ses exploits.

translation.en: But I have tasked Sir John to join this campaign
translation.fr:
J'ai chargé Sir John
d'intégrer cette campagne

translation.en: for one most vital reason alone:
he respects war as only a man who has seen its most monstrous form can.
translation.fr:
il respecte la guerre comme seul un homme
qui a connu sa monstruosité le peut.

translation.en: He lusts after it not,
but rather regards it with the grim sobriety
translation.fr: mais la considère avec la dure gravité

translation.en: that you and your men should hope he would.
Welcome,
and thank you...
[inhales] good sirs.
You're all well met.
Very good.
Are you ready for what awaits us?
translation.fr: Es-tu prêt pour ce qui nous attend ?

translation.en: One is never ready for what awaits us.
translation.fr:
Nul n'est jamais prêt
pour ce qui nous attend.

translation.en: [man] Get!
You believe Sir John there to be fit and suitable enough
translation.fr:
Vous estimez que Sir John est apte
à commander

translation.en: to captain this effort?
John is a good man.
[King Henry V] They meet us at sea or upon landing.
translation.fr: On combattra en mer ou en débarquant.

translation.en: We shall know soon enough.
translation.fr: On le saura bien assez tôt.

translation.en: You must rest.
John.
Thank you.
What for?
For being here.
With me.
Well, it's a small price to pay
to keep that detestable Hooper woman off me back.
translation.fr: pour me libérer de cette Hooper.

translation.en: Get some rest too, my liege.
We land quickly!
[man 1] Check every building.
[man 2] No man!
-[man 2] No man here! -[man 4] Clear!
-[man 5] No man here. -[man 1] No man.
[Dorset] We must storm that castle.
It will be bloody. We will most surely sacrifice souls.
translation.fr:
Le sang coulera.
On sacrifiera sûrement des vies.

translation.en: Thus is the nature of war. It is bloody and soulless.
translation.fr:
Telle est la nature de la guerre.
Sanglante et sans âme.

translation.en: -[scoffs] -We have no way of knowing how well supplied they are behind those walls.
translation.fr:
On ignore leurs réserves
derrière ces remparts.

translation.en: This siege may take months,
translation.fr: Ce siège pourrait prendre des mois,

translation.en: and months, I fear, we have not at our disposal.
translation.fr: des mois dont nous ne disposons pas.

translation.en: Men in these numbers, fixed here,
will fall to hunger and disease.
translation.fr:
qui mourront de faim
et de maladie.

translation.en: Sir John.
War is...
bloody and soulless.
The archbishop has arrived.
[archbishop] Surely you cannot simply idle here until they decide to come out?
translation.fr:
Vous ne pouvez vous contenter
d'attendre ici qu'ils sortent.

translation.en: That is precisely the definition of a siege.
translation.fr:
C'est précisément
la définition d'un siège.

translation.en: How long might that take? Surely there's no way of knowing.
translation.fr:
Combien de temps cela prendrait-il ?
Nul ne le sait.

translation.en: Uh, that too, is a common characteristic of a siege.
translation.fr:
C'est là aussi
une caractéristique d'un siège.

translation.en: -I will not send my men up that hill. -But why in heavens not?
translation.fr:
- Je n'y enverrai pas mes hommes.
- Pourquoi ?

translation.en: I will not sacrifice my men so flagrantly, nor so speculatively.
translation.fr:
Je refuse de les sacrifier si éhontément
et sur de simples spéculations.

translation.en: Well, then why do you not simply go around?
If they insist on hiding in their castle, why do you not simply go around it?
translation.fr:
S'ils tiennent à rester terrés,
pourquoi ne pas contourner le château ?

translation.en: So well versed in the art of warfare.
translation.fr: Si rompu à l'art de la guerre.

translation.en: [William] We must take this town, Archbishop.
We must establish a garrison foothold here...
for our lines of supply from England.
Do not forget that I have underwritten this campaign.
translation.fr:
N'oubliez pas
que j'ai garanti cette campagne.

translation.en: I have interest here.
And I will be heard.
Not today, Archbishop.
My liege.
They have surrendered.
-Our debate now, it seems, is for nothing. -Hmm.
translation.fr: Notre débat semble avoir été en vain.

translation.en: As are the archbishop's bleatings.
[Dorset] He wishes to slow us.
Who wishes to slow us?
We have received word that the Dauphin is en route.
translation.fr: On a appris que le dauphin est en route.

translation.en: He wishes conference with His Majesty.
And we know nothing of his purpose?
translation.fr: Et on ignore tout de son but ?

translation.en: We know only that he desires conference.
I would hope his purpose be to deliver his father's early surrender.
translation.fr:
J'espère qu'il vient nous informer
de la capitulation de son père.

translation.en: I strongly advise we disregard this word of his approach and ready our movement.
translation.fr:
Je conseille d'ignorer la nouvelle
de sa venue et d'avancer.

translation.en: We must make advantage of their disarray.
translation.fr: Il faut profiter de leur confusion.

translation.en: Sir John, your counsel.
I've never met the man... this French prince.
translation.fr:
Je n'ai jamais rencontré
ce prince français.

translation.en: I can't speak to his motivation.
[William] My liege.
He's here.
Your Majesty.
To... your little... victory.
Do you wonder why I have come?
translation.fr:
Vous vous demandez
pourquoi je suis venu ?

translation.en: Do you wonder this?
I have not come to offer you surrender
translation.fr:
Je ne suis pas venu
pour offrir notre capitulation

translation.en: if that is what you are hoping.
translation.fr: si c'est ce que vous espérez.

translation.en: I have come to describe for you
your end days,
the screams of your men
as they die slow.
And so, King of, uh, England,
you seem so intent on making France your new home,
translation.fr:
vous semblez si déterminé
à vous emparer de la France

translation.en: so let me help you.
I will drain your body of its blood
translation.fr: Je viderai votre corps de son sang

translation.en: and bury it under a tree.
A little French tree.
Very young, very small.
Since perchance that is fitting of your mind for you to come here.
translation.fr: À l'image de votre idée de venir ici.

translation.en: Small.
And maybe your...
I mean, no, your balls must be big, no?
Giant balls.
Giant balls... with a tiny cock.
translation.fr:
Des testicules géants
avec une queue toute petite.

translation.en: And the sound of your wives and children weeping
translation.fr:
Et le son des pleurs
de vos femmes et de vos enfants

translation.en: shall lull me to sleep at night.
Have you heard what I said?
I have.
It was stirring.
Sir John, please walk with me.
Good night.
Ready the men to move.
Waste no time.
[boy] Run!
Hush, hush, hush. Hush. Hush.
Hello, little boy.
Don't be afraid. Don't be afraid.
I want you to deliver a gift to your king.
translation.fr: Je veux que tu donnes un cadeau à ton roi.

translation.en: Will you do this for me?
translation.fr: Tu veux faire ça pour moi ?

translation.en: Good boy.
Double the guards to 20 yards through the night.
translation.fr: Doublez les gardes à 20 m cette nuit.

translation.en: Three hours at a watch.
I want these men fresh and alert.
Any man caught sleeping will have his eyes gouged.
translation.fr:
Quiconque sera surpris à dormir
aura les yeux arrachés.

translation.en: Any caught speaking will lose his tongue.
translation.fr:
Quiconque parlera
aura la langue arrachée.

translation.en: And I want all French prisoners in our train put to death.
translation.fr:
Et faites exécuter
tous nos prisonniers français.

translation.en: Leave their corpses speared on pikes by the river's edge.
translation.fr:
Empalez leurs cadavres
sur des piques près de la rivière.

translation.en: [Falstaff] The first command I'll heed.
The second...
you'll have to carry out that mass execution yourself.
translation.fr:
je vous laisserai réaliser
cette exécution de masse.

translation.en: What did you say to me?
You are not that man.
How dare you defy me?
Show your feeling in here, with me. -Don't let it outside this tent. -How dare you defy me? I am the king.
translation.fr:
- Réfléchissez-y bien.
- Comment oses-tu ? Je suis le roi.

translation.en: And where is the fearsome old warrior Falstaff
translation.fr: Où est le redoutable guerrier Falstaff

translation.en: about whom I've heard so much?
You've been mute since we crossed the sea.
translation.fr:
Tu ne dis mot
depuis qu'on a débarqué.

translation.en: I seem to be serving as my own chief tactician,
my own commander, my own counsel.
Where is the fearsome old warrior Falstaff?!
translation.fr:
Où est
le redoutable guerrier Falstaff ?

translation.en: I speak only when there's something to be said.
translation.fr:
Je ne parle
que quand c'est nécessaire.

translation.en: Too often have I seen men of war
translation.fr:
Par trop souvent,
j'ai vu des guerriers

translation.en: invent work for themselves,
work that leads to nothing but vainglory and slaughtered men.
translation.fr:
qui n'entraînent
que vaine gloire et massacres.

translation.en: I'm not that man.
And this here is the war that you have chosen to wage.
translation.fr:
Et nous menons la guerre
que vous avez décidée.

translation.en: I will disembowel you right here with mine own hand.
translation.fr: Je t'étriperai de mes propres mains.

translation.en: You are not that man, either.
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas vous non plus.

translation.en: -[Falstaff] Gentlemen. -[man 2] M'Lord.
Lord Dorset, summon your fastest rider.
translation.fr:
Lord Dorset,
convoquez vos cavaliers les plus rapides.

translation.en: My liege.
Dartmouth!
[panting] Sires. What can I do for you?
Tell me what lies over that hill. Ride fast, return directly.
translation.fr:
Dis-moi ce qu'il y a
par-delà cette colline. Reviens vite.

translation.en: We are both outnumbered and out-positioned.
translation.fr: On est en infériorité et mal placés.

translation.en: They have the downslope in their favor.
Our need to advance puts us already at disadvantage.
The longer we wait, the larger their force will grow,
translation.fr:
Plus on attendra,
plus leurs forces grandiront,

translation.en: and with it, our disadvantage.
Your archers, my lord, are of superior faculty.
French crossbow is no match for an English longbow.
translation.fr:
L'arbalète française ne fait pas
le poids contre nos arcs.

translation.en: We should hobble their number on first assault by these means alone.
translation.fr:
Clairsemons leurs rangs
de cette façon au premier assaut.

translation.en: York's charge in center faces four lines of mounted knights.
translation.fr:
York est face
à quatre lignes de chevaliers montés.

translation.en: Our archers here might weaken those by half. But--
translation.fr:
Nos archers peuvent
les réduire de moitié.

translation.en: But not eight lines.
Nine. Ten. More.
You speak true, my liege.
The longer we wait, the greater our disadvantage.
But it is possible our disadvantage has already grown insurmountable.
translation.fr:
Il est possible que ce désavantage
soit devenu insurmontable.

translation.en: A great many men are already desperately ill
translation.fr:
Nombre d'hommes sont déjà
gravement malades

translation.en: and weak from hunger.
What then, my lord, do you propose we do?
translation.fr: Que proposez-vous donc que l'on fasse ?

translation.en: I propose we consider turning back, my liege.
translation.fr:
Je propose
qu'on songe à faire demi-tour.

translation.en: [stammers] I know it will not bring the outcome we desire,
but nor will the evisceration of our army.
translation.fr:
mais pas plus
que l'éviscération de notre armée.

translation.en: I'm reticent to speak for others here now,
translation.fr: Je rechigne à parler pour les autres,

translation.en: but I'm certain my fears are shared.
translation.fr:
mais mes craintes sont partagées,
c'est sûr.

translation.en: Who here agrees with Lord Dorset?
translation.fr:
Qui est d'accord
avec Lord Dorset ?

translation.en: You can win this battle.
[Dorset] Is that so, Sir John?
And precisely how is that so, Sir John?
You fight without horses and without armor.
translation.fr: En combattant sans chevaux ni armures.

translation.en: Heavens above, please spare us from this man.
translation.fr: Grands dieux, gardez-nous de cet homme.

translation.en: [Falstaff] Their forward defense is a front line of mounted men.
translation.fr:
Leur défense avancée est
une ligne de cavalerie.

translation.en: Many deep.
Knights all.
All on horseback, all with heavy armor.
translation.fr:
Tous à dos de cheval
et en armure lourde.

translation.en: The ground out there...
is a flood bowl,
already half-sodden.
When it rains tonight, as I know it will,
translation.fr:
Quand il pleuvra ce soir,
c'est une certitude,

translation.en: that ground will turn into a muddy bog.
And with their horses and their armor,
translation.fr: Et avec leurs chevaux et armures,

translation.en: they will get stuck, they will fall,
and they will flounder like upturned beetles.
translation.fr:
et se débattront
tels des scarabées retournés.

translation.en: As shall we.
Not if we travel light,
without horses and without armor.
Speed and mobility will be our advantage.
translation.fr: Vitesse et mobilité seront notre avantage.

translation.en: [Westmorland] And how, Sir John, can you be so sure of rainfall tonight?
translation.fr:
Et comment, Sir John,
savez-vous qu'il pleuvra ce soir ?

translation.en: My right knee is aching. It only does that when rain is near.
translation.fr:
J'ai mal au genou droit.
Cela indique que la pluie n'est pas loin.

translation.en: Oh, save us, my liege. Please put a stop to this drivel.
This would require their armored front line come meet us in the mud.
translation.fr:
Leur première ligne devrait
nous rencontrer dans la boue.

translation.en: How do you propose we invite that?
A small forward armored attack of our own.
A false advance.
They will counter.
We save our weight and our muscle for a nimble assault from the flanks.
translation.fr:
On conserve notre poids et nos forces
pour un preste assaut des flancs.

translation.en: They shan't be so easily deceived. They will not respond to false attack.
translation.fr:
Ils ne sauraient être si aisément dupés
par une fausse attaque.

translation.en: They will respond.
We move, they will meet us in the mud.
translation.fr: Si on bouge, ils nous rencontreront.

translation.en: Our men-at-arms are outnumbered. This they know.
translation.fr:
Nos soldats sont en infériorité numérique.
Ils le savent.

translation.en: They will hope to overwhelm us, so they will meet us with full force,
translation.fr:
Ils espéreront nous submerger,
ils déplaceront toutes leurs forces,

translation.en: no matter how small our first advance.
translation.fr: qu'importe si on est peu nombreux.

translation.en: Our great longbows will rain chaos on them from above.
translation.fr:
Nos archers feront pleuvoir
un chaos de flèches du ciel.

translation.en: That chaos will be your favor.
translation.fr: Ce chaos sera à votre avantage.

translation.en: My liege, I implore you, we mustn't... we mustn't listen to this madness.
translation.fr:
Majesté, je vous en conjure,
n'écoutons pas cette folie.

translation.en: What is the true experience of this man? He once fought for Richard many years ago.
translation.fr:
Quelle est sa véritable expérience ?
Il a combattu pour Richard jadis.

translation.en: Since then, he has done nothing...
translation.fr: Depuis lors, il n'a rien fait,

translation.en: other than ride with the companies,
robbing and tormenting.
I never robbed anyone who didn't deserve to be robbed.
translation.fr:
Je n'ai jamais détroussé personne
qui ne le méritait pas.

translation.en: If it rains tonight,
we fight tomorrow.
If you have concocted this plan, half-baked and speculative,
translation.fr:
Si tu as concocté
ce plan gauche et bancal

translation.en: merely to prove to me your worth,
please say so now.
All plans are speculative.
And as I say, I only speak them when I feel them true.
translation.fr:
Et je vous l'ai dit,
je n'évoque que ce que j'estime être vrai.

translation.en: This one I feel in my bones.
translation.fr: Je le sens dans ma chair.

translation.en: This one I feel in my knee bone.
translation.fr: Je le sens dans mon genou.

translation.en: Here we are on the eve of this fight, and I am...
translation.fr: À la veille de cet affrontement, je...

translation.en: I am scared to wonder, to tell it true,
translation.fr:
j'ai peur de m'interroger,
à dire vrai...

translation.en: why we are here.
translation.fr:
sur la raison
de notre présence.

translation.en: You best discover the answer for that.
The men out there deserve it.
They've given their lives to you.
translation.fr: Ils vous ont confié leurs vies.

translation.en: I cannot say what forces have conspired to bring you here,
translation.fr:
J'ignore tout des forces
qui ont ourdi votre venue,

translation.en: but these men need you,
translation.fr:
mais ces hommes
ont besoin de vous,

translation.en: just as you need them.
These men deserve your confidence.
And if you cannot give them that,
translation.fr:
Si vous ne pouvez
leur accorder,

translation.en: at least then tell them a magnificent lie.
Though you might not think it possible...
translation.fr: Bien que tu croies cela impossible,

translation.en: you are my friend.
Good night, Hal.
Sleep well.
This wind whips from the north.
The rain was sent from England.
Why are you being fitted with plate? We were to fight without armor.
translation.fr:
Pourquoi ce plastron ?
On combat sans armures.

translation.en: We need a front line to draw them in.
translation.fr: La première ligne doit les attirer.

translation.en: It cannot be you.
[Falstaff] The idea was mine.
Some man must lead the first push to sell it well.
translation.fr:
Un homme doit mener l'offensive
pour qu'ils mordent à l'hameçon.

translation.en: My men have been assembled.
And I cannot, in good conscience,
translation.fr: Et je ne peux, en mon âme et conscience,

translation.en: send them out there to realize my speculative drivel
without getting muddy alongside them, can I?
translation.fr:
sans patauger dans la boue
avec eux.

translation.en: I will fight with you.
[inhales] It's noble, but you know that cannot be.
This is what I was built for.
I die here or... I die over a bottle in Eastcheap.
translation.fr:
Je mourrai ici
ou une bouteille à la main à Eastcheap.

translation.en: And I think this makes for a much better story.
translation.fr:
Mais ici,
j'en sortirai plus glorieux.

translation.en: And you have things still to do.
translation.fr:
Vous avez encore
des tâches à accomplir.

translation.en: You will join this fight.
But promise me you don't join too early.
translation.fr: Mais promettez-moi de ne pas arriver trop tôt.

translation.en: It doesn't matter what you see out there.
We must first draw them all in. All of them.
translation.fr: On doit d'abord tous les attirer. Tous.

translation.en: Promise me that, Hal.
Win, my friend.
Maybe then you'll lighten enough to have a drink with me. Hmm?
translation.fr:
Vous vous dériderez alors assez
pour boire avec moi.

translation.en: [in English] Please.
Please speak English.
I enjoy to speak English.
It is simple... and ugly.
I have been waiting all morning,
all the night...
for your surrender.
It might have saved a great unease
translation.fr: Bien des inquiétudes eussent été épargnées

translation.en: had it come sooner.
translation.fr: si elle était survenue plus tôt.

translation.en: I know you do not speak for your father. I do speak for my father.
translation.fr:
- Vous ne parlez pas pour votre père.
- Je parle pour mon père.

translation.en: I know you do not speak for your father, so I come to you now directly.
translation.fr:
Vous ne parlez pas pour lui,
je viens donc à vous.

translation.en: I have not come to surrender.
translation.fr: Je ne suis pas venu capituler.

translation.en: Too much Christian blood will be spilled on this field today.
translation.fr:
Trop de sang chrétien sera versé
sur ce champ de bataille.

translation.en: So, I propose this:
You and I fight, one man on one man.
translation.fr: combattons vous et moi, d'homme à homme,

translation.en: We fight in our armies' stead.
translation.fr: en lieu et place de nos armées.

translation.en: If I lose, my men will leave this place forthwith and forever.
translation.fr:
Je perds, mes hommes partiront
sans délai et pour toujours.

translation.en: You will have my head.
If I win,
I will assume this kingdom's crown upon your father's death.
translation.fr:
la couronne du royaume
me reviendra à la mort de votre père.

translation.en: What say you?
Are you scared, young Henry?
What say you?
Are you scared of this battle?
There is no shame of it.
translation.fr: Il n'y a aucune honte à avoir.

translation.en: Save your men.
You save your own men.
You came here. To me!
translation.fr: Vous êtes venu ici. Me voir, moi !

translation.en: [yells] Surrender to me!
I cannot do that.
[Dauphin] Well, then, boy,
let us make famous... that field out there.
translation.fr: faisons passer ce champ à la postérité.

translation.en: This little village of Agincourt,
that will forever mark the site of your callow disgrace.
translation.fr:
qui sera à jamais le symbole
de votre disgrâce naïve.

translation.en: You expect of me a speech?
I have only one to give, and it is the same one I'd give
translation.fr:
Je n'en ai qu'un,
et c'est le même que je donnerais

translation.en: were we not standing on the brim of a battlefield.
translation.fr: si nous n'étions pas prêts à guerroyer.

translation.en: It is the same one I'd give were we to meet in the street by chance.
translation.fr:
C'est le même que je donnerais
si nous nous croisions dans la rue.

translation.en: I have only ever hoped for one thing...
translation.fr: Je n'ai jamais aspiré qu'à une chose,

translation.en: to see this kingdom united under this English crown.
translation.fr:
voir ce royaume uni
sous la couronne anglaise.

translation.en: All men are born to die. We know it. We carry it with us always.
translation.fr:
Tous les hommes sont mortels.
Nous le savons. Nous l'acceptons.

translation.en: If your day be today, so be it.
translation.fr:
Si vous devez mourir aujourd'hui,
alors, soit.

translation.en: Mine will be tomorrow.
Or mine today and yours tomorrow. It matters not.
What matters is that you know, in your hearts,
translation.fr: Tant que vous savez, dans vos cœurs,

translation.en: that today you are that kingdom united.
translation.fr: que vous êtes ce royaume uni.

translation.en: You are England. Each and every one of you. England is you.
translation.fr:
Vous êtes l'Angleterre.
Chacun d'entre vous. Le pays, c'est vous.

translation.en: And it is the space between you.
Fight not for yourselves, fight for that space.
translation.fr:
Ne combattez pas pour vous,
mais pour cet espace.

translation.en: Fill that space. Make it tissue. Make it mass.
translation.fr:
Comblez cet espace.
Faites-en du tissu. De la masse.

translation.en: Make it impenetrable. Make it yours!
Make it England!
Make it England!
Great men to it. Captains, lords.
Great men to it!
For the King and St. George!
Archers.
[man 1] Archers!
[man 2] Archers!
[man 3] Archers! Now!
Draw!
Loose!
Halt!
Ready!
Loose!
On me!
Come then...
King of England.
Hail the King.
Hail the King.
Hail the King.
-God save the King. -Hail the King.
Hail the King.
-Hail the King. -Hail King Henry. Hail the King.
translation.fr:
- Vive le roi.
- Vive le roi Henri.

translation.en: [Westmorland] My liege.
The prisoners we have took are a rabble.
translation.fr: Les prisonniers sont du petit peuple.

translation.en: I fear we will not secure them should their army regroup.
translation.fr:
Nous ne pourrons les retenir
si leur armée se regroupe.

translation.en: Kill them all.
[in English] Your Majesty...
Come sit here with me.
Please.
I like to have the sun on my skin, but not too much.
translation.fr:
J'aime le contact du soleil sur ma peau,
mais point trop.

translation.en: Too much is very dangerous.
This conversation we are about to have...
has been had many times before,
translation.fr: a déjà souvent eu lieu par le passé

translation.en: and will be had many times again for centuries to come
translation.fr:
et aura encore souvent lieu
dans les siècles à venir

translation.en: between men of vanity and men of good reason.
translation.fr:
entre hommes orgueilleux
et hommes de bonne raison.

translation.en: I would hope that you and I are men of good reason.
translation.fr:
J'espère que vous et moi
sommes hommes de bonne raison.

translation.en: I have, of course, traveled here to offer you my surrender.
translation.fr:
Je suis, bien sûr,
venu jusqu'ici pour capituler.

translation.en: Do you ask anything of me in return?
I do, however,
have for you a proposition.
You take the hand of my daughter, Catherine,
translation.fr: Prenez la main de ma fille, Catherine,

translation.en: in marriage.
It is most uncanny...
that the great movements of history
translation.fr: mais les grands mouvements de l'histoire

translation.en: so frequently find their origins in the minutia of family.
translation.fr:
trouvent fréquemment leur origine
dans les menus détails de la famille.

translation.en: That in ways I dare not unsettle here,
translation.fr: À bien des égards, je n'ose évoquer

translation.en: my relationship with my son
and yours... with your father.
translation.fr: et la vôtre avec votre père,

translation.en: These are the things that have led us here today.
translation.fr:
ce sont ces choses-là
qui nous ont menés ici aujourd'hui.

translation.en: We are leaders of lands and peoples,
translation.fr: Nous dirigeons des terres et des gens,

translation.en: and yet... it is family that moves us.
translation.fr:
or, c'est la famille
qui est notre raison d'être.

translation.en: Family...
consumes us.
My condolences to you...
for the loss of your friend, Sir John.
translation.fr: pour la perte de votre ami, Sir John.

translation.en: I know you must feel this loss deeply.
translation.fr: Je sais combien il doit vous manquer.

translation.en: Thank you, William.
Your loyalty to me has been comforting.
translation.fr: Ta loyauté m'a été un réconfort.

translation.en: You have proven yourself to be a most worthy king.
translation.fr:
Vous vous êtes révélé être
un roi des plus dignes.

translation.en: I would say you have proven yourself
translation.fr:
Je dirais même
que vous vous êtes révélé

translation.en: to be one of England's great kings.
translation.fr: être un des grands rois d'Angleterre.

translation.en: [Lord Chamberlain] Your Majesty, the crowd has gathered.
translation.fr: Votre Majesté, une foule s'est réunie.

translation.en: So I hear.
[in English] There is much I wonder about a great many things.
translation.fr:
Je m'interroge beaucoup
sur bien des choses.

translation.en: [in English] Indeed there must be for you
to contemplate marriage to a woman about whom... you know so little.
translation.fr:
de réfléchir à un mariage
avec une femme dont vous savez si peu.

translation.en: I will not submit to you.
translation.fr: Je ne me soumettrai pas à vous.

translation.en: You must earn my respect.
I understand that.
Do you?
I do.
Do you feel a sense of achievement?
In what regard?
In any regard.
I have achieved that which my father never could.
translation.fr:
J'ai réalisé
ce dont mon père a été incapable.

translation.en: I have united this kingdom in common cause.
translation.fr:
Unir ce royaume
autour d'une cause commune.

translation.en: You have achieved momentary respite.
translation.fr: Vous n'avez obtenu qu'un répit fugace.

translation.en: A unity forged under false pretense will never be a unity that prevails.
translation.fr:
Une unité forgée sous un faux prétexte
ne prévaudra jamais.

translation.en: How, pray, have my endeavors been forged falsely?
translation.fr:
Comment mon entreprise
a-t-elle été façonnée faussement ?

translation.en: Why did you bring war to France?  Your father came on spoiling.
translation.fr:
- Pourquoi cette guerre contre la France ?
- Provocation de votre père.

translation.en: How so? How was he spoiling?
He sent an assassin.
There was no assassin.
translation.fr: Il n'y a pas eu d'assassin.

translation.en: There was no plot to kill you.
How might you know?
Because I was with my father when he received word of your charge.
translation.fr:
J'étais avec mon père
quand il a reçu vos accusations.

translation.en: I know him well enough to know his reaction to be genuine.
translation.fr: Je sais que sa réaction était sincère.

translation.en: How was his reaction?
He laughed.
He laughed very much. He said you must be drunk.
translation.fr: Il a dit que vous deviez être soûl.

translation.en: Your father is a madman.
He may be mad, but he is true.
translation.fr: Peut-être bien, mais il dit vrai.

translation.en: His madness makes him true. He says only what he believes.
translation.fr:
Sa folie le rend sincère.
Il ne dit que ce qu'il croit.

translation.en: That is why he is loved.
The assassin then was sent by your brother.
translation.fr:
L'assassin a été envoyé
par votre frère.

translation.en: -My brother? -Mm-hmm. My brother was too stupid to conjure such a plan.
translation.fr:
Mon frère était trop bête
pour tramer un tel plan.

translation.en: What was your true reason? Did you know of the ball he sent?
translation.fr:
- Quelle était votre véritable raison ?
- Il m'a envoyé une balle.

translation.en: The ball he sent to me?
A ball?
He sent to you...
translation.fr: Il vous a envoyé une balle ?

translation.en: -a ball? -Why should you question my intent?
translation.fr: Il vous a envoyé une balle ? Pourquoi douter de mes intentions ?

translation.en: Your father's rule is illegitimate. He has no right claim to his throne.
translation.fr:
Le règne de votre père est illégitime.
Le trône n'est pas à lui.

translation.en: All monarchy is illegitimate.
You yourself are the son of a usurper.
translation.fr: Vous êtes le fils d'un usurpateur.
