translation.en: It would seem that you have no explanation for what you have done.
translation.fr:
Vous ne semblez avoir
aucune explication pour vos décisions.

translation.en: You have shed the blood of so many Christian souls, and yet...
translation.fr:
Vous avez versé le sang
de nombres d'âmes chrétiennes, mais

translation.en: before me now, all I see is a...
young and vain and foolish man so easily riled.
translation.fr:
qu'un jeune impudent
prompt à l'agacement.

translation.en: So easily beguiled.
I must leave you now.
[William] Gentle.
We must be sure to revel in this day, my friend.
translation.fr:
Nous devons nous assurer
de savourer cette journée, mon ami.

translation.en: A crowd has gathered in honor of our victory.
translation.fr:
Une foule s'est réunie
en l'honneur de notre victoire.

translation.en: These are the rare moments for which a king truly lives, I would imagine.
translation.fr:
Ces rares moments
sont la raison d'être d'un roi, j'imagine.

translation.en: In all my preoccupation, I have... neglected to ask after your family.
translation.fr:
Préoccupé que j'étais, j'ai omis
de te demander si ta famille va bien.

translation.en: Your preoccupations are hardly trifling.
translation.fr:
Vos préoccupations ne sont pas
des vétilles.

translation.en: You have two sons.
I do.
[King Henry V] And...
your wife minds your estate in your absence.
translation.fr:
ton épouse gère tes biens
en ton absence.

translation.en: [William] She does.
Yours is sheep.
You're a man of wool.
As was my father before me.
How many head?
At last count, some 4,000. Mostly Dorset Horns.
translation.fr:
Au dernier comptage, environ 4 000.
De la race Dorset.

translation.en: How much land have you?
To be true, I'm not...
wholly certain, but...
but many... many hundreds of beautiful, beautiful acres.
What lands in France have you now annexed?
translation.fr:
Quelles terres as-tu annexées
en France ?

translation.en: [William] Stop.
Now that France is ours, how much of her land is now yours?
translation.fr:
Maintenant qu'on a la France,
combien de terres possèdes-tu ?

translation.en: Oh, well...
That has yet to be determined. [chuckles]
Your conquest is so recent.
-Why do you ask this question-- -Stay up there.
-Hmm? -Stay up there.
How did my assassin come to you?
translation.fr:
Comment mon assassin
est-il venu à toi ?

translation.en: I fail to remember the moment.
Remedy this failure.
So much has happened in the intervening months.
translation.fr: Tant de choses sont arrivées depuis.

translation.en: An event as pivotal as this one
should be amply equipped to penetrate the fog of time elapsed.
translation.fr:
devrait aisément percer
les brouillards du temps écoulé.

translation.en: Of course.
Let me recall.
Was it in the street?
Did he come to you in the street?
translation.fr:
Est-il venu à toi
dans la rue ?

translation.en: Yes. Yes, it was in the street.
He approached me... [inhales]
most unusually.
My liege, please, tell me the cause of this concern.
translation.fr:
Majesté, je vous en prie,
dites-moi ce qui vous préoccupe.

translation.en: Stay up there.
Stay up there.
Did he know your name?
I don't believe he did.
How, then, did he know who you were to approach?
translation.fr: Comment a-t-il su qui tu étais ?

translation.en: The memory is returning.
He surrendered himself to palace guards
translation.fr: Il s'est livré aux gardes du palais,

translation.en: and the matter was brought to my attention. I was taken to him.
translation.fr:
l'affaire a été portée à mon attention,
je suis allé le voir.

translation.en: So, he did not come to you in the street. No. No, it was not in the street. Forgive me.
translation.fr:
- Il ne t'a pas abordé dans la rue.
- Non. Pas dans la rue. Pardonnez-moi.

translation.en: I was summoned to his cell.
translation.fr: J'ai été mandé à sa cellule.

translation.en: Has a problem arisen...
Hal?
Yes. A problem has arisen.
And it wobbles before me now on its silly little stool
translation.fr:
Et il vacille devant moi
sur son tabouret ridicule

translation.en: -at mine own elevation. -I'm afraid I don't understand.
translation.fr:
- et me toise.
- Je ne comprends pas.

translation.en: -Please, please, stop this charade. -Sincerely, I do not understand.
translation.fr:
- Cesse cette comédie.
- Je ne comprends vraiment pas.

translation.en: [yells] Stop the fucking charade! Stop it!
translation.fr: Cesse cette putain de charade ! Arrête !

translation.en: [yells] I have given you what you wanted, boy!
translation.fr:
Je vous ai donné
ce que vous vouliez, petit !

translation.en: Have I not?!
You wanted peace. [yells] Did you not?!
translation.fr: Vous vouliez la paix. N'est-ce pas ?

translation.en: This is how peace is forged.
It is forged in victory.
translation.fr: Elle est forgée dans la victoire.

translation.en: Listen.
That is the sound of peace.
translation.fr: C'est le bruit de la paix.

translation.en: That is the sound of your peace.
translation.fr: C'est le bruit de votre paix.

translation.en: That is the sound of your greatness.
translation.fr: C'est le bruit de votre grandeur.

translation.en: I ask nothing of you...
only that you will always speak to me clear and true.
translation.fr: de toujours me dire la vérité.

translation.en: Always.
Will you promise me only that?
-[crowd] Long live the King! -I will.
